verses.verse: ט֤וֹב <WH2896> Better פַּ֣ת <WH6595> morsel חֲ֭רֵבָה <WH2720> [is] a dry וְשַׁלְוָה־ <WH7962> and quietness בָ֑הּ מִ֝בַּ֗יִת <WH1004> therewith than an house מָלֵ֥א <WH4392> full זִבְחֵי־ <WH2077> of sacrifices רִֽיב׃ <WH7379> [with] strife

עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> servant מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <WH7919> A wise יִ֭מְשֹׁל <WH4910> shall have rule בְּבֵ֣ן <WH1121> over a son מֵבִ֑ישׁ <WH954> that causeth shame וּבְת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among אַ֝חִ֗ים <WH251> the brethren יַחֲלֹ֥ק <WH2505> and shall have part נַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> of the inheritance

מַצְרֵ֣ף <WH4715> The fining pot לַ֭כֶּסֶף <WH3701> [is] for silver וְכ֣וּר <WH3564> and the furnace לַזָּהָ֑ב <WH2091> for gold וּבֹחֵ֖ן <WH974> trieth לִבּ֣וֹת <WH3826> the hearts יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> but the LORD

מֵ֭רַע <WH7489> A wicked doer מַקְשִׁ֣יב <WH7181> giveth heed עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> lips אָ֑וֶן <WH205> to false שֶׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> [and] a liar מֵ֝זִין <WH238> giveth ear עַל־ <WH5921> and לְשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> tongue הַוֹּֽת׃ <WH1942> to a naughty

לֹעֵ֣ג <WH3932> Whoso mocketh לָ֭רָשׁ <WH7326> the poor חֵרֵ֣ף <WH2778> reproacheth עֹשֵׂ֑הוּ <WH6213> his Maker שָׂמֵ֥חַ <WH8056> [and] he that is glad לְ֝אֵ֗יד <WH343> at calamities לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִנָּקֶֽה׃ <WH5352> shall not be unpunished

עֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> [are] the crown זְ֭קֵנִים <WH2205> of old men בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Children's בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> children וְתִפְאֶ֖רֶת <WH8597> and the glory בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> of children אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> [are] their fathers

לֹא־ <WH3808> is not נָאוָ֣ה <WH5000> becometh לְנָבָ֣ל <WH5036> not a fool שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> speech יֶ֑תֶר <WH3499> Excellent אַ֝֗ף <WH637> less כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְנָדִ֥יב <WH5081> a prince שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> lips שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> much less do lying

אֶֽבֶן־ <WH68> stone חֵ֣ן <WH2580> [is as] a precious הַ֭שֹּׁחַד <WH7810> A gift בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the eyes בְעָלָ֑יו <WH1167> of him that hath אֶֽל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he יִפְנֶ֣ה <WH6437> it whithersoever it turneth יַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH7919> it prospereth

מְֽכַסֶּה־ <WH3680> He that covereth פֶּ֭שַׁע <WH6588> a transgression מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> seeketh אַהֲבָ֑ה <WH160> love וְשֹׁנֶ֥ה <WH8138> but he that repeateth בְ֝דָבָ֗ר <WH1697> a matter מַפְרִ֥יד <WH6504> separateth אַלּֽוּף׃ <WH441> [very] friends
תֵּ֣חַת <WH5181> entereth גְּעָרָ֣ה <WH1606> A reproof בְמֵבִ֑ין <WH995> more into a wise man מֵהַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> stripes כְּסִ֣יל <WH3684> into a fool מֵאָֽה׃ <WH3967> than an hundred

אַךְ־ <WH389> only מְרִ֥י <WH4805> only rebellion יְבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> [man] seeketh רָ֑ע <WH7451> An evil וּמַלְאָ֥ךְ <WH4397> messenger אַ֝כְזָרִ֗י <WH394> therefore a cruel יְשֻׁלַּח־ <WH7971> shall be sent בּֽוֹ׃

פָּג֬וֹשׁ <WH6298> of her whelps meet דֹּ֣ב <WH1677> Let a bear שַׁכּ֣וּל <WH7909> robbed בְּאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> a man וְאַל־ <WH408> rather than כְּ֝סִ֗יל <WH3684> a fool בְּאִוַּלְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH200> in his folly

מֵשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> Whoso rewardeth רָ֭עָה <WH7451> evil תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> for good לֹא־ <WH3808> not [תָמִישׁ כ] (תָמ֥וּשׁ <WH4185> cease ק) רָ֝עָ֗ה <WH7451> evil מִבֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> from his house

פּ֣וֹטֵֽר <WH6362> [is as] when one letteth out מַ֭יִם <WH4325> water רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> The beginning מָד֑וֹן <WH4066> of strife וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הִ֝תְגַּלַּ֗ע <WH1566> it be meddled הָרִ֥יב <WH7379> contention נְטֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH5203> therefore leave off

מַצְדִּ֣יק <WH6663> He that justifieth רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> the wicked וּמַרְשִׁ֣יעַ <WH7561> and he that condemneth צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> the just תּוֹעֲבַ֥ת <WH8441> [are] abomination יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3069> God גַּם־ <WH1571> alike שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> even they both

לָמָּה־ <WH4100> how long זֶּ֣ה <WH2088> is there מְחִ֣יר <WH4242> Wherefore [is there] a price בְּיַד־ <WH3027> in the hand כְּסִ֑יל <WH3684> of a fool לִקְנ֖וֹת <WH7069> to get חָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> wisdom וְלֶב־ <WH3820> seeing [he hath] no heart אָֽיִן׃ <WH369> has
בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֭ת <WH6256> at all times אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> loveth הָרֵ֑עַ <WH7453> A friend וְאָ֥ח <WH251> and a brother לְ֝צָרָ֗ה <WH6869> for adversity יִוָּלֵֽד׃ <WH3205> is born

אָדָ֣ם <WH120> A man חֲסַר־ <WH2638> void לֵ֭ב <WH3820> of understanding תּוֹקֵ֣עַ <WH8628> striketh כָּ֑ף <WH3709> hands עֹרֵ֥ב <WH6148> [and] becometh עֲ֝רֻבָּ֗ה <WH6161> surety לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> in the presence רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> of his friend

אֹ֣הֵֽב <WH157> He loveth פֶּ֭שַׁע <WH6588> transgression אֹהֵ֣ב <WH157> that loveth מַצָּ֑ה <WH4683> strife מַגְבִּ֥יהַּ <WH1361> [and] he that exalteth פִּ֝תְח֗וֹ <WH6607> his gate מְבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> seeketh שָֽׁבֶר׃ <WH7667> destruction

עִקֶּשׁ־ <WH6141> He that hath a froward לֵ֭ב <WH3820> heart לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יִמְצָא־ <WH4672> findeth ט֑וֹב <WH2896> no good וְנֶהְפָּ֥ךְ <WH2015> and he that hath a perverse בִּ֝לְשׁוֹנ֗וֹ <WH3956> tongue יִפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> falleth בְּרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> into mischief

יֹלֵ֣ד <WH3205> He that begetteth כְּ֭סִיל <WH3684> a fool לְת֣וּגָה <WH8424> [doeth it] to his sorrow ל֑וֹ וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִ֝שְׂמַ֗ח <WH8055> hath no joy אֲבִ֣י <WH1> and the father נָבָֽל׃ <WH5036> of a fool

לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart שָׂ֭מֵחַ <WH8056> A merry יֵיטִ֣ב <WH3190> doeth good גֵּהָ֑ה <WH1456> [like] a medicine וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit נְ֝כֵאָ֗ה <WH5218> but a broken תְּיַבֶּשׁ־ <WH3001> drieth גָּֽרֶם׃ <WH1634> the bones

שֹׁ֣חַד <WH7810> a gift מֵ֭חֵיק <WH2436> out of the bosom רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> A wicked יִקָּ֑ח <WH3947> [man] taketh לְ֝הַטּ֗וֹת <WH5186> to pervert אָרְח֥וֹת <WH734> the ways מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> of judgment

אֶת־ <WH854> is in פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the presence מֵבִ֣ין <WH995> has חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> Wisdom וְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> but the eyes כְ֝סִ֗יל <WH3684> of a fool בִּקְצֵה־ <WH7097> [are] in the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
כַּ֣עַס <WH3708> [is] a grief לְ֭אָבִיו <WH1> to his father בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son כְּסִ֑יל <WH3684> A foolish וּ֝מֶ֗מֶר <WH4470> and bitterness לְיוֹלַדְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH3205> to her that bare

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> is also עֲנ֣וֹשׁ <WH6064> Also to punish לַצַּדִּ֣יק <WH6662> the just לֹא־ <WH3808> not ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [is] not good לְהַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> [nor] to strike נְדִיבִ֣ים <WH5081> princes עַל־ <WH5921> and יֹֽשֶׁר׃ <WH3476> for equity

חוֹשֵׂ֣ךְ <WH2820> spareth אֲ֭מָרָיו <WH561> his words יוֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> He that hath דָּ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge [וְקַר־ כ] (יְקַר־ <WH7119> who ק) <WH7119> who אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> [and] a man תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> of understanding

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> Even אֱוִ֣יל <WH191> Even a fool מַ֭חֲרִישׁ <WH2790> when he holdeth his peace חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> wise יֵחָשֵׁ֑ב <WH2803> is counted אֹטֵ֖ם <WH331> [and] he that shutteth שְׂפָתָ֣יו <WH8193> his lips נָבֽוֹן׃ <WH995> [is esteemed] a man of understanding
